member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD
member.summary: Contains information about an event record returned by the function.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.Length
member.summary: The size of this event record, in bytes. Note that this value is stored at both ends of the entry to ease moving forward or backward through the log. The length includes any pad bytes inserted at the end of the record for DWORD alignment.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.Reserved
member.summary: A DWORD value that is always set to ELF_LOG_SIGNATURE (the value is 0x654c664c), which is ASCII for eLfL.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.RecordNumber
member.summary: The number of the record. This value can be used with the EVENTLOG_SEEK_READ flag in the function to begin reading at a specified record. For more information, seeEvent Log Records.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.TimeGenerated
member.summary: The time at which this entry was submitted. This time is measured in the number of seconds elapsed since 00:00:00 January 1, 1970, Universal Coordinated Time.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.TimeWritten
member.summary: The time at which this entry was received by the service to be written to the log. This time is measured in the number of seconds elapsed since 00:00:00 January 1, 1970, Universal Coordinated Time.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.EventID
member.summary: The event identifier. The value is specific to the event source for the event, and is used with source name to locate a description string in the message file for the event source. For more information, seeEvent Identifiers.

summary.para: The type of event. This member can be one of the following values.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.NumStrings
member.summary: The number of strings present in the log (at the position indicated by StringOffset). These strings are merged into the message before it is displayed to the user.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.EventCategory
member.summary: The category for this event. The meaning of this value depends on the event source. For more information, seeEvent Categories.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.StringOffset
member.summary: The offset of the description strings within this event log record.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.UserSidLength
member.summary: The size of the UserSid member, in bytes. This value can be zero if no security identifier was provided.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.UserSidOffset
member.summary: The offset of the security identifier (SID) within this event log record. To obtain the user name for this SID, use the function.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.DataLength
member.summary: The size of the event-specific data (at the position indicated by DataOffset), in bytes.

member.name: EVENTLOGRECORD.DataOffset
member.summary: The offset of the event-specific information within this event log record, in bytes. This information could be something specific (a disk driver might log the number of retries, for example), followed by binary information specific to the event being logged and to the source that generated the entry.
